content: *make this teeny tortoise as seen in martha stewart living january 2010 lion brand yarn * skill level easy 2 colors 1 ball each wool-ease® article #620 or vanna s choice® article #860 crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 6 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing exact gauge is not essential to this project some construction required to finish available in different versions 70591ad amigurumi turtle 1 2005 wool-ease® article #620 *lemongrass & avocado* 81009ad amigurumi turtle 2 2005 published in michael s create vanna s choice® article #860 *pea green & dusty green* 81109ad tiny turtle 3 2009 vanna s choice® article #860 *mustard & dusty green* 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70591ad html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-turtle-3 3 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/81109ad html
